item.title: Leonard Cohen - Hallelujah - Key of G - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Hallelujah by Leonard Cohen from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: B7, C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Leonard Cohen - You Want It Darker - Key of Em - BruderMaister
item.description: Play along video for the song You Want It Darker by Leonard Cohen from the channel BruderMaister. Chords used in the song: Am, C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Leonard Cohen - Waiting for the Miracle - Key of Em - BruderMaister
item.description: Play along video for the song Waiting for the Miracle by Leonard Cohen from the channel BruderMaister. Chords used in the song: Am, B7, C, D, Em, E♭dim.
